title: Emmerdale spoilers: Who is Nate? Star reveals 'gobsmacking' twist
text:
Tonight, Emmerdale fans will be treated to a spectacle and a half as Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) acts out every viewers frustration at sleazy Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) as he kicks off his murderous revenge in a dramatic hour long episode which culminates with a terrifying boat explosion.

But there’s more to farm hand Nate than a young chancer looking to get with an older woman – Jurell has confirmed that there is an almighty twist on the horizon and has teased that fans will be ‘gobsmacked’ when the truth comes to light tonight.

Speaking to the Daily Star, he said: ‘There are so many theories out there but when the audience see it they will be shocked. I found out about it when I was first cast and I was like: “Wow.” I don’t want to spoil it but it’s a massive reveal.’

It’s only one part of a massive episode which sees Cain trick Nate and Moira (Natalie J Robb) onto a boat before he then reveals to Nate that he knows about the affair. But as Cain prepares to kill his love rival, Jurell teases that his alter ego can give as good as he gets when it comes to fighting Cain.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He smiled: ‘It was like filming a movie. We had stunt coordinators helping us with the fight scenes, and of course there’s an ­explosion. Nate sees Cain as this old man, he doesn’t know about his reputation as this village hard-man but even if he did he wouldn’t care.’

Lives will be left hanging in the balance as the disastrous consequences of the affair rock the main players to the core. And it’s not just the blast that will have serious repercussions as the reveal of Nate’s true identity seems set to trigger a whole new series of dramatic events.

Emmerdale continues on Tuesday 22nd October at 7pm on ITV.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: You might not see this one coming.
